title: GitHub Student Developer Pack
description: Access to GitHub Pro, GitHub Copilot, and over 100 premium developer tools, including cloud credits, free domains, and professional software.

title: Notion Education Plus
description:
Notion Plus Plan, unlimited file uploads, integrations, longer page history and much more; works for any .edu email.

You can also (later on) sign up via GH SDP to get unlimited guests here, or sign up as a student organitzation or club here.

title: JetBrains Student License
description: Free access to all JetBrains IDEs like IntelliJ IDEA, PyCharm, WebStorm, and GoLand. Professional tools for programmers.

title: Appwrite Cloud
description: 150GB of free storage, global CDN, and developer services: databases, APIs, and serverless functions.

title: Deepnote
description: Online notebooks to work with Python and share easily without local installations.

title: Camber
description: Advanced scientific simulations with AI. Solve differential equations and generate matplotlib graphs automatically.

title: Namecheap Domains
description: One year of free .me domain for students. Ideal for portfolios and personal projects with GitHub Pages or Vercel.

title: Educative Courses
description: 6 months of free access to professional courses in programming, systems, and web development.

title: Frontend Masters
description: 6 months free access to exclusive web development courses: React, Vue, Node.js, advanced CSS, and more.

title: AlgoExpert
description: Access to 20 technical interview questions on algorithms and data structures. Includes explanations and detailed videos.

title: Microsoft Azure
description: Free credits and up to 2 years of access to virtual machines and cloud services with the GitHub Student Pack.

title: DigitalOcean
description: €200 in free credits to spend in 1 year. Perfect for deploying VPS, web apps, and databases.

title: Autodesk Education
description: Free access to the entire Autodesk suite for 3 years: AutoCAD, Maya, Fusion 360, Revit, and more.

title: Figma Education Plan
description: Free access to Figma Professional plan while you are a student. Ideal for UI/UX and collaborative design.

title: Unity Student Plan
description: Unity Pro free for students. Develop professional games and simulations at no cost.

title: MATLAB & Simulink
description: Free access to MATLAB and Simulink suite for UB students thanks to the campus license.

title: Lucidchart Education
description: Free premium version of Lucidchart for students. Ideal for creating diagrams, flows, and concept maps.

title: Spotify Premium Student
description: Spotify Premium at 50% discount: ad-free music, offline downloads, and unlimited skips.

title: Amazon Prime Student
description: Discounted Prime subscription: free shipping, Prime Video, and more. Only €24.95/year.

title: Google Gemini Student
description: 1 month free trial of Gemini Pro with 2TB storage and NotebookLM.

title: Codédex (Codédex Club)
description: Learn-to-code platform for Gen-Z with practical courses (Python, HTML, CSS, JS, React, Git). Verified students usually get 6 months of Codédex Club free via GitHub Student Pack.

title: Scrimba
description: Interactive learning platform (specialized in frontend). With the GitHub Student Pack, you usually get 1 month of free Pro access to explore courses and projects.

title: InterviewCake
description: Resources and practice for technical interviews (algorithms, data structures). The student offer gives full access for 1 week via GitHub Student Pack.

title: Visme (Education)
description: All-in-one tool to create presentations, infographics, and visual content. Special plans for students and educational institutions with access to templates and multimedia resources.

title: Tower (Git client)
description: Powerful desktop Git client for macOS and Windows. Tower Pro is usually offered free to verified students (Tower Pro license via GitHub Student Pack or educational program).

title: Termius
description: SSH client with cross-platform sync. Students get access to Pro/Team features while verified as students (usual offer in GitHub Student Pack).

title: Mathpix Snip (Educational plan)
description: Advanced OCR for math and technical documents; converts images and PDFs to LaTeX/Markdown. The educational plan increases the number of 'snips' and OCR pages for educational accounts (e.g., 20 snips in some educational plans).

title: Cursor
description: Code editor with AI features. Verified university students can get Cursor Pro free for 1 year (access to premium models and editor features).

title: Slack for Education (descompte)
description: Slack education program: qualified institutions/educational spaces can apply for a discount (usually up to 85%) on Pro or Business+ plans. It is not an automatic individual coupon — the application must be made by the organization/space.

title: SOLIDWORKS (Student/xDesign)
description: Professional CAD suite for students: SOLIDWORKS xDesign / Student Edition offers educational licenses at a very reduced price (usual promo: ~60 USD/EUR per year for the student web/desktop version depending on the offer). Includes courses and certifications in some packages.

title: UNiDAYS
description: Free platform for students that aggregates discounts on fashion, technology, subscriptions, and more (registration and verification with student email/ID).

title: Student Beans
description: Student discount platform (similar to UNiDAYS). Offers codes and deals on software, subscriptions, and e-commerce; often used for promotions like NordVPN, Prezi, etc.

title: Prezi (Edu Plus / Edu Pro)
description: Prezi offers EDU plans at reduced prices for students and teachers: EDU Plus usually at ~€4/month (billed annually) and EDU Pro with more features at educational price; includes Prezi AI and advanced presentation tools.
